messages.subject: Re: TO ALL HANDS/  TURNBULL ALERT----resp ProfMurf: -------.TITLE
messages.msgSnippet: Turnbull s new book is Samurai:  The World of the Warrior:  Uncloak the Mysteries of the Orient.  The book is $29.95 but is on sale at Barnes & Noble on the
messages.messageBody:
Turnbull's new book is Samurai: The World of the Warrior: Uncloak the
Mysteries of the Orient. The book is $29.95 but is on sale at Barnes & Noble on
the Web at $17.95, 40 % off the cover. This is the first week the book is in
the stores too, so it appears B & N is not suspecting high sales. Jack Murphy,
The Japan Foundation


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
